item.title: Mystery Merchant
item.description: 98683 Special thanks to Irketh of Mystery Merchants Discord Server for the initial compilation of Mystery Merchant information. Mystery Merchant is an NPC that sells goods in exchange for special currency called Mystery Merchant Coin. For the sake of simplicity, there are two different types of merchants: City Merchant and Wandering Merchant. City Merchant City Merchants are merchants located specific in the 4 major cities : Velika, Allemantheia, Kaiator, and Highwatch.
